posts.author: makiwoni
posts.content: Hey guys, just wondering if there is such a thing as a irc chat room or something of that sort for character building that we cna just throw ideas and brainstorm out and ask smaller questions that some people can just answer on the spot instead of posting on the forums? Just wondering because I feel kind of almost bad that if I have a million questions and then I post them all I feel like I'm spamming the forums haha
